body_html: For what it's worth, I have implemented CTC using just theano (but overriding autograd's gradient) so that it can run either on CPU or GPU without low level bindings (https://github.com/nlgranger/Recipes/tree/connectionist_temporal_classification/papers/connectionist_temporal_classification). I guess it would be possible to translate that to PyTorch although some parts might be tricky, and I cannot say anything about the speed either.
